name: Disacol Free Puzzle
description:
Disacol beautifully mixes box moving and color matching. Move the box pusher around and bring boxes of the same color together to make them disappear. Enjoy increasing satisfaction as you clear the board. Every board will challenge your mind until you find the right pushing sequence and make boxes of all colors disappear.

All levels are hand made. This way, you get a high level of fun and challenge while playing them.

Post your progress on twitter to challenge your friends, and be as fast as possible to obtain a high online ranking at the end of the game.

This is a free version of Disacol, limited to the first 5 levels of the game.
